title: Here's the Ocean's Eight Cast Casually Power Posing on the Subway
text:
Here's the Ocean's Eight Cast Casually Power Posing on the Subway 
Rihanna shares the film's first still. Getty By Alyssa Bailey Jan 30, 2017 This morning while you were commuting to work, Rihanna tweeted what a subway ride looks like for the cast of Ocean's Eight . The first official glimpse of the film has everyone there—RiRi, Mindy Kaling, Sandra Bullock, Anne Hathaway, Cate Blanchett, Helena Bonham Carter, Sarah Paulson, Awkwafina—all dressed to slay: First looQ at #Oceans8 . Coming summer 2018. pic.twitter.com/NNbgolsnWu
